framework.name: CIS Controls v8
framework.description: CIS Critical Security Controls are a prioritised set of actions that collectively form a defence-in-depth set of best practices that mitigate the most common attacks against systems and networks. Version 8 was released in 2021.

controls.control_family: Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets
controls.name: Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets
controls.description: Actively manage all enterprise assets connected to the infrastructure physically, virtually, remotely, and those within cloud environments.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use AWS Config or Cloud Asset Inventory for continuous asset discovery and tracking.

controls.control_family: Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets
controls.name: Establish and Maintain Detailed Enterprise Asset Inventory
controls.description: Establish and maintain an accurate, detailed, and up-to-date inventory of all enterprise assets.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable AWS Config recording for all resource types in all regions.

controls.control_family: Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets
controls.name: Address Unauthorised Assets
controls.description: Ensure that a process exists to address unauthorised assets on a weekly basis.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Create Config rules to detect resources outside approved configurations.

controls.control_family: Inventory and Control of Software Assets
controls.name: Inventory and Control of Software Assets
controls.description: Actively manage all software on the network so that only authorised software is installed and can execute.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use Systems Manager Inventory and ECR scanning for software inventory.

controls.name: Data Protection
controls.description: Develop processes and technical controls to identify, classify, securely handle, retain, and dispose of data.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable S3 encryption, use Macie for data discovery, and KMS for key management.

controls.name: Establish and Maintain a Data Management Process
controls.description: Establish and maintain a data management process that addresses data sensitivity, ownership, and handling.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use Macie or DLP to discover and classify sensitive data.

controls.name: Configure Data Access Control Lists
controls.description: Configure data access control lists based on a user's need to know.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use S3 Access Analyzer to identify overly permissive bucket policies.

controls.name: Encrypt Sensitive Data in Transit
controls.description: Encrypt sensitive data in transit using secure protocols.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enforce HTTPS and TLS 1.2+ for all services.

controls.name: Encrypt Sensitive Data at Rest
controls.description: Encrypt sensitive data at rest on servers, applications, and databases.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable default encryption for S3, RDS, and EBS volumes.

controls.control_family: Secure Configuration of Enterprise Assets and Software
controls.name: Secure Configuration of Enterprise Assets and Software
controls.description: Establish and maintain the secure configuration of enterprise assets and software.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use AWS Config conformance packs or SCC for configuration compliance.

controls.name: Account Management
controls.description: Use processes and tools to assign and manage authorisation to credentials for user accounts.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor IAM events in CloudTrail for account lifecycle changes.

controls.name: Establish and Maintain an Inventory of Accounts
controls.description: Establish and maintain an inventory of all accounts managed in the enterprise.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use IAM Credential Report and Organizations to inventory all accounts.

controls.name: Disable Dormant Accounts
controls.description: Delete or disable any dormant accounts after a period of inactivity.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use IAM Credential Report to identify accounts without recent activity.

controls.name: Restrict Administrator Privileges to Dedicated Administrator Accounts
controls.description: Restrict administrator privileges to dedicated administrator accounts on enterprise assets.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Separate admin and user accounts; monitor admin account usage.

controls.name: Access Control Management
controls.description: Use processes and tools to create, assign, manage, and revoke access credentials and privileges for user, administrator, and service accounts.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use IAM Access Analyzer to identify excessive permissions.

controls.name: Require MFA for Externally-Exposed Applications
controls.description: Require all externally-exposed applications to enforce MFA.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enforce MFA for all public-facing applications.

controls.name: Require MFA for Remote Network Access
controls.description: Require MFA for remote network access.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enforce MFA for all VPN and remote access connections.

controls.name: Require MFA for Administrative Access
controls.description: Require MFA for all administrative access accounts.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor for root/admin logins without MFA via CloudTrail.

controls.name: Continuous Vulnerability Management
controls.description: Develop a plan to continuously assess and track vulnerabilities on all enterprise assets.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable Amazon Inspector for EC2 and container vulnerability scanning.

controls.name: Audit Log Management
controls.description: Collect, alert, review, and retain audit logs of events that could help detect, understand, or recover from an attack.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable CloudTrail in all regions with log file validation and S3 storage.

controls.name: Collect Audit Logs
controls.description: Collect audit logs from enterprise assets.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable CloudTrail management events and VPC Flow Logs.

controls.name: Collect Detailed Audit Logs
controls.description: Configure detailed audit logging for enterprise assets containing sensitive data.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable CloudTrail data events for S3, Lambda, and DynamoDB.

controls.name: Centralise Audit Logs
controls.description: Centralise, to the extent possible, audit log collection and retention across enterprise assets.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use organization trail to centralise logs across all accounts.

controls.name: Conduct Audit Log Reviews
controls.description: Conduct reviews of audit logs to detect anomalies or abnormal events.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use CloudWatch Logs Insights or Chronicle for log analysis.

controls.name: Email and Web Browser Protections
controls.description: Improve protections and detections of threats from email and web vectors.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use WAF or Cloud Armor to protect web applications from common attacks.

controls.name: Malware Defences
controls.description: Prevent or control the installation, spread, and execution of malicious applications, code, or scripts.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable GuardDuty Malware Protection for EBS volume scanning.

controls.name: Data Recovery
controls.description: Establish and maintain data recovery practices sufficient to restore in-scope enterprise assets to a pre-incident and trusted state.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable AWS Backup with cross-region replication for critical data.

controls.name: Network Infrastructure Management
controls.description: Establish and maintain the secure configuration of network devices.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use AWS Config rules to monitor security group and NACL changes.

controls.name: Network Monitoring and Defence
controls.description: Operate processes and tooling to establish and maintain comprehensive network monitoring and defence against security threats.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable VPC Flow Logs and GuardDuty for network threat detection.

controls.name: Security Awareness and Skills Training
controls.description: Establish and maintain a security awareness programme to influence behaviour among the workforce.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Security awareness training is an organisational process. Not detectable via cloud APIs.

controls.name: Service Provider Management
controls.description: Develop a process to evaluate service providers who hold sensitive data or are responsible for an enterprise's critical IT platforms.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor third-party integrations and cross-account access.

controls.name: Application Software Security
controls.description: Manage the security life cycle of in-house developed, hosted, or acquired software to prevent, detect, and remediate security weaknesses.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable container image scanning and code analysis in CI/CD pipelines.

controls.name: Incident Response Management
controls.description: Establish a programme to develop and maintain an incident response capability.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use Security Hub or SCC to centralise incident detection and response.

controls.name: Penetration Testing
controls.description: Test the effectiveness and resiliency of enterprise assets through identifying and exploiting weaknesses in controls.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Regular penetration testing complements automated scanning. Follow AWS/GCP penetration testing policies.
